column3: Latest; Thailand: A Cambodian man has sustained serious injuries from electric shock while working on a pole in Pattaya on December 14.------According to ------The Pattaya News------
column4: the incident occurred at 2:40 M near Soi Korpai on Thep Prasit Road.------25 year old Mr. Nop
column5: a Cambodian national suffered multiple burns and was unconscious. He legally worked for the electric company  and was rushed to a local hospital.------A co-worker
column6: who didn’t want to give his name
column7: said that Nop was wearing safety equipment and was near the top of the pole when he was shocked. Due to wearing the proper equipment and being secured he didn’t fall down to the ground.------The incident is under investigation by electric company officials.
